author: Judith Vicchio
text: UPPER MERION TOWNSHIP WILL BE IN RECEIPT OF FUNDS FROM THE NEW VALLEY FORGE CASINO RESORT HERE IN KING OF PRUSSIA PA FREOM CASINO REVENUES.   THE TOWNSHJIP IS FORMULATING A POLICY FOR DISBURSEMENT OF THESE FUNDS AND IS LOOKING FOR CRITERIA FOR ELIGIBILITY, NEED, ETC. TO CONSIDER DURING THE DISBURSEMENT REVIEW PROCESS.  WHAT INFORMATION IS AVAILABLE TO HELP THE TOWNSHIP IN DRAFTING THIS POKICY.
title: DISBURSEMENT OF FOUNDATION FUNDS
